message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $12,000. I think it would be very valuable to you, and this is a very competitive offer.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,000 represents the value of this product, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $9,000? I think that's a fair price for both of us
